name: Chilly Chicken
description: Chilli chicken is a popular Indo-chinese appetizer made by tossing fried chicken in spicy hot chilli sauce.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: Mango sticky rice is a traditional Southeast Asian and South Asian dessert made with glutinous rice, fresh mango and coconut milk, and eaten with a spoon or the hands.

name: Mexican Shawarma
description: Shawarma is marinated with various seasonings and spices such as cumin, turmeric, and paprika. It is made by stacking thinly sliced meat, typically lamb, beef, or chicken, on a large rotating skewer or cone. It is also sometimes cooked with extra fat from the meat to give it a juicer taste.

name: Pizza
description: Pizza is a dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flat base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with various ingredients

name: Bibimbap
description: A popular Korean dish featuring mixed rice with assorted vegetables, meat, and spicy gochujang sauce.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
description: A delicious fried rice dish made with kimchi, vegetables, and often topped with a fried egg.

name: Bulgogi
description: Marinated and grilled thinly sliced beef, typically served with vegetables and rice.

name: Japchae
description: Korean glass noodle stir-fry with vegetables and often some meat, seasoned with soy sauce and sesame oil.

name: Dak Galbi
description: Spicy stir-fried chicken with vegetables, often cooked at the table in a large pan.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Spicy rice cakes served in a hot and sweet sauce, a popular Korean street food.

name: Haemul Pajeon
description: Korean seafood pancake made with a variety of seafood and scallions.

name: Doenjang Jjigae
description: A Korean soybean paste stew with tofu, vegetables, and often served with rice.

name: Korean BBQ
description: A Korean barbecue feast with various cuts of marinated meat, often grilled at the table.

name: Kimbap
description: Korean rice rolls filled with vegetables, egg, and meat, similar to sushi rolls.

name: Butter Chicken
description: A rich and creamy Indian curry with tender pieces of chicken in a flavorful tomato-based sauce.

name: Biryani
description: A fragrant rice dish with spices, saffron, and a choice of chicken, lamb, or vegetables.
